definition: according with one's wish or expectation
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
sweetheart/one's true love/the person of one's thoughts
sth that is expected or wished for

sentences.english: Wanting to do him dirt, she sent his wife a poison-pen letter.
sentences.chinese: 施詭計就寫了一封惡意中傷的信給他的妻子。

sentences.english: Slander , the viper , has wrongfully accused me.
sentences.chinese: 謠言這條毒蛇對我進行了惡意中傷。

sentences.english: I gave my ear to what I now know was the malice of slander .
sentences.chinese: 我過去聽信了謠言，現在我知道那是惡意中傷。
她是意中藝術工作室的項目策展人。

sentences.english: Sometimes it's difficult to draw a line between backbiting and malicious gossip.
sentences.chinese: 有時很難區分誹謗和惡意中傷。

sentences.english: Singleness is meant to be a “waiting period” for finding the right person.
sentences.chinese: 單身是爲找到意中人的一段等待期。

sentences.english: But much of the venom in the press, at any rate, is directed at big multinationals.
sentences.chinese: 然，媒體的許多惡意中傷，矛頭直指大的跨國公司。

sentences.english: You were my high school sweetheart , And still are.
sentences.chinese: 高中時代，你是我的意中人，一直到。

sentences.english: Italy-China friendly cooperation in various fields has made fruitful results and enjoys a broad future.
sentences.chinese: 意中在各個領域的友好合作成果豐碩，前景廣闊。

sentences.english: There are now many potential partners for divorced people to choose from.
sentences.chinese: 離婚的人可以從很多潛在的伴侶中選擇自己的意中人。

sentences.english: It is not easy to traduce his character.
sentences.chinese: 惡意中傷他人是不對的。

sentences.english: So eventually you know maybe you can sniff the right man out.
sentences.chinese: 所以最終你知道或許你可以聞出你的意中人。

sentences.english: Younger sons cannot marry where they like.
sentences.chinese: 小兒子往往有了意中人而不能結婚。

sentences.english: The candidate was viciously slurred by his opponent.
sentences.chinese: 候選人遭到對手惡意中傷。

sentences.english: His reputation was bespattered by malicious gossip.
sentences.chinese: 他的聲譽遭到惡意中傷的詆譭。

sentences.english: You’re just a child and bothered about your beaux .
sentences.chinese: 現在你還是個孩子，還只爲自己的意中人操心哪。

definition: inadvertent/accidental/to have no intention of (doing sth)
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
different/unique/special/very/(classical) to behead/to die/to cut off/to separate/to surpass
